headline: GoDaddy Inc. (GDDY): Among Jeff Smith’s Top Activist Targets
summary: We recently published a list of Jeff Smith’s Top 10 Activist Targets and Their Returns Compared to the S&P 500. In this article, we are going to take a look at where GoDaddy Inc. (NYSE:GDDY) stands against other Jeff Smith’s top activist targets. Jeff Smith is arguably the “most feared man” in corporate America, having […]
